title: Dissonant Whispers
content:
Dissonant Whispers Level 1 Enchantment Spell 3~18 Damage 3d6 Psychic Frighten a creature: it will be easier to hit and cannot move. 2 turns On Save: Target only takes half damage. 18m WIS Save Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Dissonant Whispers

Level 1 Enchantment Spell

Frighten a creature: it will be easier to hit and cannot move.

On Save: Target only takes half damage.
